title: Resolve a Customer Billing Dispute
description: A trucking company disputes a charge on their invoice, claiming they were billed for storage fees on a container that was on hold by customs.

tasks.description: Retrieve the disputed invoice and the container's history.
tasks.expected_outcome: Clerk finds the invoice and the container's movement history in the system.

tasks.description: Verify the dates of the customs hold and compare them to the storage (demurrage) charge period.
tasks.expected_outcome: Clerk confirms the storage charges were for the same period the container was on customs hold.

tasks.description: Based on port policy that storage is not charged during a customs hold, waive the fee and issue a corrected invoice.
tasks.expected_outcome: The disputed charge is credited, and a new invoice is generated and sent to the customer.
